TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRowsetChange

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DeleteRows (int hChapterReserved, int cRows, int[] rghRows, out int[] rgRowStatus);
.method public newslot virtual instance void DeleteRows(int32 hChapterReserved, int32 cRows, int32[] rghRows, int32[] rgRowStatus) cil managed

Docs.param: The number of rows to be deleted.
An array of handles of the rows to be deleted.
An array with `cRows` elements in which to return values indicating the status of each row specified in `rghRows`.

MemberSignature.Value: public void InsertRow (int hChapterReserved, int hAccessor, IntPtr pData, out int hRow);
.method public newslot virtual instance void InsertRow(int32 hChapterReserved, int32 hAccessor, native int pData, int32 hRow) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle of the accessor to use.
A pointer to memory containing the new data values, at offsets that correspond to the bindings in the accessor.
A pointer to memory in which to return the handle of the new row.
Docs.summary: Creates and initializes a new row.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetData (int hRow, int hAccessor, IntPtr pData);
.method public newslot virtual instance void SetData(int32 hRow, int32 hAccessor, native int pData) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle of the row in which to set data.
The handle of the accessor to use.
A pointer to memory containing the new data values, at offsets that correspond to the bindings in the accessor.
Docs.summary: Sets data values in one or more columns in a row.
